answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Motiryo, 
Thank you for your important question on hearing conservation programs. Unfortunately I was not able to find a specific example program for you to use. I was able to find a document that discusses hearing conservation and the role it plays in a comprehensive employee safety plan. http://icma.org/en/Article/100412/Workplace_Safety
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Motiryo Keambiroiro
text:
I am interested in any municipality that has a Hearing Conservation Program policy or publication that could be shared with our Uility Division Manager 
Joe Pearce,  jpearce@dconc.gov
title: Hearing Conservation Programs
